engChrName: Over there!
engSearchText: Over there!
jpnChrName: あれは……！
jpnSearchText: あれは……！

engChrName: Looks like pieces of those mechanical monsters we met in the fog last night.
engSearchText:
Looks like pieces of those mechanical monsters we
met in the fog last night.
jpnChrName: 霧の中にいた機械の魔獣……
jpnSearchText: 霧の中にいた機械の魔獣……

engChrName: Judging by the way they were destroyed, we must be in the right place.
engSearchText:
Judging by the way they were destroyed, we must be
in the right place.
jpnChrName: 徹底的に切り刻まれてます…… ……やっぱりあの人ですね。
jpnSearchText:
徹底的に切り刻まれてます……
……やっぱりあの人ですね。

engChrName: Yeah. These are freshly minced, too.
engSearchText: Yeah. These are freshly minced, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、見たところ それほど時間も経ってねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、見たところ
それほど時間も経ってねえ。

engChrName: Much as I'd like to call for backup, 'fraid we don't got the time.
engSearchText:
Much as I'd like to call for backup, 'fraid we don't got
the time.
jpnChrName: 応援を呼ぶのもアリだったが 急いだ方がいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
応援を呼ぶのもアリだったが
急いだ方がいいだろう。

engChrName: Seein' a lot of bots, but no goons. They gotta be deeper in with Aaron.
engSearchText:
Seein' a lot of bots, but no goons. They gotta be
deeper in with Aaron.
jpnChrName: 見たところ半グレはいねぇが ガラクタやらが彷徨いている。
jpnSearchText:
見たところ半グレはいねぇが
ガラクタやらが彷徨いている。

engChrName: Remember to stay on your toes in here. There may be some surprises waitin' for us.
engSearchText:
Remember to stay on your toes in here. There may be
some surprises waitin' for us.
jpnChrName: 思った以上に広そうだし 慎重に奥へ向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
思った以上に広そうだし
慎重に奥へ向かうぞ。

engChrName: Roger!
engSearchText: Roger!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）。
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）。

engChrName: Let's find Aaron before it's too late!
engSearchText: Let's find Aaron before it's too late!
jpnChrName: 何とかアーロンさんに 追いつきましょう……！
jpnSearchText:
何とかアーロンさんに
追いつきましょう……！

engChrName: M-Mercy!
engSearchText: M-Mercy!
jpnChrName: か、勘弁してくれ！
jpnSearchText: か、勘弁してくれ！

engChrName: Let us go and you'll never see us again! We'll quit the mafia life for good! I swear!
engSearchText:
Let us go and you'll never see us again! We'll quit the
mafia life for good! I swear!
jpnChrName: もうこの街から手を引く！ マフィアとも手を切るから、許してくれ！
jpnSearchText:
もうこの街から手を引く！
マフィアとも手を切るから、許してくれ！

engChrName: Mercy?
engSearchText: Mercy?
jpnSearchText: ………許す…………？

engChrName: You murder my friends and then have the stones to ask for mercy?
engSearchText:
You murder my friends and then have the stones to
ask for mercy?
jpnChrName: セイやホアンたちをあんな風にした お前らをか……？
jpnSearchText:
セイやホアンたちをあんな風にした
お前らをか……？

engChrName: Heheh. Sorry but I'm not as forgiving as Aidios.
engSearchText: Heheh. Sorry but I'm not as forgiving as Aidios.
jpnChrName: クク、そいつは慈悲深き 天上聖母サマのお仕事だなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
クク、そいつは慈悲深き
天上聖母サマのお仕事だなぁ……

engChrName: All I've got for you...
engSearchText: All I've got for you...
jpnChrName: 俺の仕事は──
jpnSearchText: 俺の仕事は──

engChrName: ...is a one-way ticket straight to Gehenna!
engSearchText: ...is a one-way ticket straight to Gehenna!
jpnChrName: セイたちの仇のてめぇらを まとめて煉獄行きにしてやるだけだッ！！
jpnSearchText:
セイたちの仇のてめぇらを
まとめて煉獄行きにしてやるだけだッ！！

engChrName: EEEEEK!
engSearchText: EEEEEK!
jpnChrName: ひぃぃぃ！！！
jpnSearchText: ひぃぃぃ！！！

engChrName: Hold on!
engSearchText: Hold on!
jpnChrName: ──その辺にしとけ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>──その辺にしとけ！

engChrName: Not you guys again...
engSearchText: Not you guys again...
jpnSearchText:
………………………
………また、てめえらか……

engChrName: 'Fraid a lot of people have been askin' us to keep an eye out for you, kid.
engSearchText:
'Fraid a lot of people have been askin' us to keep an
eye out for you, kid.
jpnChrName: 一応、各方面の“依頼”なんでな。 お前を気に掛けてくれ、だとよ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、各方面の“依頼”なんでな。
お前を気に掛けてくれ、だとよ。

engChrName: They're still breathing!
engSearchText: They're still breathing!
jpnChrName: ……全員まだ 息があるみたいですっ！
jpnSearchText:
……全員まだ
息があるみたいですっ！

engChrName: We made it in time.
engSearchText: We made it in time.
jpnChrName: ……よ、よかった………
jpnSearchText: ……よ、よかった………

engChrName: You forget Heiyue doesn't have your back here? Killin' these guys'll land you in some real shit.
engSearchText:
You forget Heiyue doesn't have your back here?
Killin' these guys'll land you in some real shit.
jpnChrName: 黒月入りしてない身での 殺（バラ）しはリスクが高い。
jpnSearchText:
黒月入りしてない身での
殺（バラ）しはリスクが高い。

engChrName: Chill out and let the pros handle the rest.
engSearchText: Chill out and let the pros handle the rest.
jpnChrName: 連中に引き渡すくらいにしとけ。
jpnSearchText: 連中に引き渡すくらいにしとけ。

engChrName: Where do you get off telling me what to do?
engSearchText: Where do you get off telling me what to do?
jpnChrName: ハッ、聞いた口を……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、聞いた口を……

engChrName: I'm sick of your shit, ya old fart! Let's finish what we started at the docks!
engSearchText:
I'm sick of your shit, ya old fart! Let's finish what we
started at the docks!
jpnChrName: どうしても邪魔するってんなら ──まずはテメェからだ………！
jpnSearchText:
どうしても邪魔するってんなら
──まずはテメェからだ………！

engChrName: H-He's serious this time!
engSearchText: H-He's serious this time!
jpnChrName: な、なんて殺気……
jpnSearchText: な、なんて殺気……

engChrName: Wh-What do we do...?
engSearchText: Wh-What do we do...?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！

engChrName: Whoop his ass.
engSearchText: Whoop his ass.
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ、相手をするぞ。
jpnSearchText: 仕方ねえ、相手をするぞ。

engChrName: I'll face him. You two, back me up.
engSearchText: I'll face him. You two, back me up.
jpnChrName: お前らはサポートに徹しろ。 ──落とす加減はこっちでする。
jpnSearchText:
お前らはサポートに徹しろ。
──落とす加減はこっちでする。

engChrName: Shut your damn mouth, spriggan!
engSearchText: Shut your damn mouth, spriggan!
jpnChrName: 舐めてんじゃねえぞ裏解決屋（スプリガン）ンンンンッ！！！
jpnSearchText: 舐めてんじゃねえぞ裏解決屋（スプリガン）ンンンンッ！！！

engChrName: GET YOUR HANDS OFF ME!
engSearchText: GET YOUR HANDS OFF ME!
jpnChrName: てめえぇええ！！！
jpnSearchText: てめえぇええ！！！

engChrName: WAKE THE HELL UP, KID!
engSearchText: WAKE THE HELL UP, KID!
jpnChrName: いい加減にしやがれ！ アーロン・ウェイ！！！
jpnSearchText:
いい加減にしやがれ！
アーロン・ウェイ！！！

engChrName: You really think these grunts masterminded what went down last night?
engSearchText:
You really think these grunts masterminded what
went down last night?
jpnChrName: こいつらは駒だ！ 始末したところで意味はねえ！
jpnSearchText:
こいつらは駒だ！
始末したところで意味はねえ！

engChrName: Course you don't!
engSearchText: Course you don't!
jpnChrName: そんなことをしても てめえの憂さ晴らしになるだけだ！
jpnSearchText:
そんなことをしても
てめえの憂さ晴らしになるだけだ！

engChrName: So what the hell kinda revenge is this?
engSearchText: So what the hell kinda revenge is this?
jpnChrName: それがてめえの“仇討ち”か！？
jpnSearchText: それがてめえの“仇討ち”か！？
っ……！！

engChrName: Use your brain for two seconds!
engSearchText: Use your brain for two seconds!
jpnChrName: 目を見開け！　耳を澄ませろ！ 怒りで思考を曇らせるな！
jpnSearchText:
目を見開け！　耳を澄ませろ！
怒りで思考を曇らせるな！

engChrName: What was that weird fog yesterday? And what's Almata got to do with it?
engSearchText:
What was that weird fog yesterday? And what's
Almata got to do with it?
jpnChrName: あの怪しい霧はなんだ！？ アルマータは何をするつもりだ！？
jpnSearchText:
あの怪しい霧はなんだ！？
アルマータは何をするつもりだ！？

engChrName: Something's up here, but you gotta get to the root of the problem!
engSearchText:
Something's up here, but you gotta get to the root of
the problem!
jpnChrName: こいつらの背後に一体どういう陰謀が 隠されているか、それを全部暴き出せ！
jpnSearchText:
こいつらの背後に一体どういう陰謀が
隠されているか、それを全部暴き出せ！

engChrName: 'Less you do that, you'll never avenge your friends!
engSearchText: 'Less you do that, you'll never avenge your friends!
jpnChrName: それこそが──大切な仲間に手向ける “本当の仇討ち”への筋道だろうが！
jpnSearchText:
それこそが──大切な仲間に手向ける
“本当の仇討ち”への筋道だろうが！

engChrName: Grr...
engSearchText: Grr...
jpnSearchText: …………ッッッ………………

engChrName: W-We owe you one, man.
engSearchText: W-We owe you one, man.
jpnChrName: へ、へへ、助かったぜ……
jpnSearchText: へ、へへ、助かったぜ……

engChrName: Don't speak too soon.
engSearchText: Don't speak too soon.
jpnChrName: 流石にムシが良すぎです。
jpnSearchText: 流石にムシが良すぎです。

engChrName: Huh?!
engSearchText: Huh?!
jpnChrName: ひぃっ……
jpnSearchText: ひぃっ……

engChrName: Aaron's right to be angry with you all.
engSearchText: Aaron's right to be angry with you all.
jpnChrName: アーロンさんの怒りも当然です……
jpnSearchText: アーロンさんの怒りも当然です……

engChrName: You did such a wicked thing to his friends...
engSearchText: You did such a wicked thing to his friends...
jpnChrName: ……あんな風に人を殺めて…… 女神もお許しにならないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……あんな風に人を殺めて……
女神もお許しにならないでしょう。

engChrName: H-Hold on! We didn't kill anyone!
engSearchText: H-Hold on! We didn't kill anyone!
jpnChrName: ち、違うっ！ そもそも昨夜の殺しは俺たちじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText:
ち、違うっ！
そもそも昨夜の殺しは俺たちじゃねえ！

engChrName: (So Van and Elaine's suspicions were correct...)
engSearchText: (So Van and Elaine's suspicions were correct...)
jpnChrName: （ヴァンさんとエレインさんが   言っていた……）
jpnSearchText:
（ヴァンさんとエレインさんが
言っていた……）

engChrName: Don't mess with me! I saw their bodies with my own eyes!
engSearchText:
Don't mess with me! I saw their bodies with my
own eyes!
jpnChrName: てめえ……この期に及んで しらばっくれるつもりかッッ！！？
jpnSearchText:
てめえ……この期に及んで
しらばっくれるつもりかッッ！！？

engChrName: I swear to Aidios that wasn't what was supposed to happen!
engSearchText:
I swear to Aidios that wasn't what was supposed
to happen!
jpnChrName: ち、違うっ！　本当に違うんだ！！
jpnSearchText: ち、違うっ！　本当に違うんだ！！

engChrName: Our orders were just to rough 'em up a bit.
engSearchText: Our orders were just to rough 'em up a bit.
jpnChrName: 奇襲をかけたのは、たっ、確かに俺らだが、 そこまではやってねえんだ！
jpnSearchText:
奇襲をかけたのは、たっ、確かに俺らだが、
そこまではやってねえんだ！

engChrName: Someone else came in and finished 'em off!
engSearchText: Someone else came in and finished 'em off!
jpnChrName: マフィアの指示も“痛めつける”だけだった…… 殺しまでは、やっちゃいねえんだよ！！
jpnSearchText:
マフィアの指示も“痛めつける”だけだった……
殺しまでは、やっちゃいねえんだよ！！

engChrName: But who would do that?
engSearchText: But who would do that?
jpnChrName: で、では誰が……
jpnSearchText: で、では誰が……

engChrName: Start from the beginning, what happened?
engSearchText: Start from the beginning, what happened?
jpnChrName: ……洗いざらい話してもらおうか。
jpnSearchText: ……洗いざらい話してもらおうか。

engChrName: O-Okay.
engSearchText: O-Okay.
jpnChrName: 話す！　全部話すから！
jpnSearchText: 話す！　全部話すから！

engChrName: We met up and headed to the Eastern Quarter as planned. We started wailing on those kids, but then—
engSearchText:
We met up and headed to the Eastern Quarter
as planned. We started wailing on those kids, but
then—
jpnChrName: 昨夜、東方人街に奇襲をかけてガキどもを 叩きのめしたら……ア、アイツらが───
jpnSearchText:
昨夜、東方人街に奇襲をかけてガキどもを
叩きのめしたら……ア、アイツらが───

engChrName: Still your tongue.
engSearchText: Still your tongue.
jpnChrName: ──そこまでだ。
jpnSearchText: ──そこまでだ。

engChrName: Don't you know what happens to snitches?
engSearchText: Don't you know what happens to snitches?
jpnChrName: お喋りは感心しないねぇ。
jpnSearchText: お喋りは感心しないねぇ。

engChrName: Aaaaah!
engSearchText: Aaaaah!
jpnChrName: ガガガガ……
jpnSearchText: ガガガガ……

engChrName: Hraaa!
engSearchText: Hraaa!
jpnChrName: ムウウンッッ！！
jpnSearchText: ムウウンッッ！！

engChrName: Don't look!
engSearchText: Don't look!
jpnChrName: 見るなッ……！
jpnSearchText: 見るなッ……！

engChrName: Ngh!
engSearchText: Ngh!
jpnSearchText: っ……！

engChrName: Guessin' you're some of Almata's honchos, yeah?
engSearchText: Guessin' you're some of Almata's honchos, yeah?
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。 アルマータの“幹部”だな？
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど。
アルマータの“幹部”だな？

engChrName: But of course.
engSearchText: But of course.
jpnChrName: フフフ、正解だよ。
jpnSearchText: フフフ、正解だよ。

engChrName: I'm Viola: the boss' favorite little helper.
engSearchText: I'm Viola: the boss' favorite little helper.
jpnChrName: あたしはヴィオーラ。 ボスのお気に入りにして右腕さ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしはヴィオーラ。
ボスのお気に入りにして右腕さ。

engChrName: I suspect Melchior holds that distinction.
engSearchText: I suspect Melchior holds that distinction.
jpnChrName: ……今のお気に入りは メルキオルだと思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
……今のお気に入りは
メルキオルだと思ったが。

engChrName: Sh-Shut it, you!
engSearchText: Sh-Shut it, you!
jpnChrName: っ、黙りな！
jpnSearchText: っ、黙りな！

engChrName: My name is Alexandre.
engSearchText: My name is Alexandre.
jpnChrName: 俺はアレクサンドル。 同じくアルマータ幹部の一人だ。
jpnSearchText:
俺はアレクサンドル。
同じくアルマータ幹部の一人だ。

engChrName: You must be the spriggan Melchior encountered recently.
engSearchText:
You must be the spriggan Melchior
encountered recently.
jpnChrName: お前がメルキオルと絡んだ裏解決屋だな？
jpnSearchText: お前がメルキオルと絡んだ裏解決屋だな？

engChrName: Don't remind me.
engSearchText: Don't remind me.
jpnChrName: 不本意に、だがな。
jpnSearchText: 不本意に、だがな。

engChrName: How could you do that to your own allies?
engSearchText: How could you do that to your own allies?
jpnChrName: か、幹部の人が どうして自分の仲間を……
jpnSearchText:
か、幹部の人が
どうして自分の仲間を……

engChrName: 'Allies'? Aren't you precious.
engSearchText: 'Allies'? Aren't you precious.
jpnChrName: 仲間ァ？ めでたい嬢ちゃんだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
仲間ァ？
めでたい嬢ちゃんだねぇ。

engChrName: When a tool loses its use, it is discarded.
engSearchText: When a tool loses its use, it is discarded.
jpnChrName: この者たちは“捨て駒”。 不要になったから片付けただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
この者たちは“捨て駒”。
不要になったから片付けただけだ。

engChrName: It was YOU, wasn't it?
engSearchText: It was YOU, wasn't it?
jpnChrName: ……そうか、テメエらが…………
jpnSearchText: ……そうか、テメエらが…………

engChrName: You're the bastards that killed my friends...
engSearchText: You're the bastards that killed my friends...
jpnChrName: テメエらの仕業なんだな……？ ……セイたちをあんな風にしたのは………
jpnSearchText:
テメエらの仕業なんだな……？
……セイたちをあんな風にしたのは………

engChrName: It's a shame they didn't put up more of a fight.
engSearchText: It's a shame they didn't put up more of a fight.
jpnChrName: ああ、ザコばっかりで つまらない仕事だったけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ザコばっかりで
つまらない仕事だったけどねぇ。

engChrName: RAAAAAH!
engSearchText: RAAAAAH!
jpnChrName: ッオオオオオ……！！
jpnSearchText: ッオオオオオ……！！

engChrName: Don't even try it!
engSearchText: Don't even try it!
jpnSearchText: ……！　よせ！

engChrName: I'LL FREAKING KILL YOU!
engSearchText: I'LL FREAKING KILL YOU!
jpnChrName: くたばれええええええッ！！！
jpnSearchText: くたばれええええええッ！！！

engChrName: Not so fast!
engSearchText: Not so fast!
jpnChrName: 甘いね──！
jpnSearchText: 甘いね──！

jpnChrName: ッッ！？
jpnSearchText: ッッ！？

engChrName: You're wide open.
engSearchText: You're wide open.
jpnChrName: 隙だらけだ。
jpnSearchText: 隙だらけだ。

engChrName: Gah!
engSearchText: Gah!
jpnChrName: かはっ……！
jpnSearchText: かはっ……！

engChrName: Aaron!
engSearchText: Aaron!
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……！
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん……！

engChrName: A needlegun, huh? Talk about a nasty weapon.
engSearchText: A needlegun, huh? Talk about a nasty weapon.
jpnChrName: 短針銃（ニードルガン）か…… エグいのを使ってやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
短針銃（ニードルガン）か……
エグいのを使ってやがるな。

engChrName: And I'm guessin' you're ex-military, big guy?
engSearchText: And I'm guessin' you're ex-military, big guy?
jpnChrName: そっちのアンタは軍隊上がりか？
jpnSearchText: そっちのアンタは軍隊上がりか？

engChrName: Not bad, spiky.
engSearchText: Not bad, spiky.
jpnChrName: へえ……？
jpnSearchText: へえ……？

engChrName: I see your acumen extends beyond that of Eastern martial arts.
engSearchText:
I see your acumen extends beyond that of Eastern
martial arts.
jpnChrName: フ……そちらも囓っているのは 東方武術だけではないな？
jpnSearchText:
フ……そちらも囓っているのは
東方武術だけではないな？

engChrName: No comment.
engSearchText: No comment.
jpnChrName: さあてね。
jpnSearchText: さあてね。

engChrName: (They're clearly both fighting pros. We don't stand a chance right now.)
engSearchText:
(They're clearly both fighting pros. We don't stand a
chance right now.)
jpnChrName: （どちらも達人クラスか……   ちょっとばかりキツそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（どちらも達人クラスか……
ちょっとばかりキツそうだな。）

engChrName: (If I make an opening, maybe they can get him out...)
engSearchText: (If I make an opening, maybe they can get him out...)
jpnChrName: （何とかこいつらだけでも──）
jpnSearchText: （何とかこいつらだけでも──）

engChrName: Don't worry. We don't have orders to kill you...
engSearchText: Don't worry. We don't have orders to kill you...
jpnChrName: フフ、アンタらを始末するのは “指示”には入ってないからね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、アンタらを始末するのは
“指示”には入ってないからね。

engChrName: ...for now, anyway.
engSearchText: ...for now, anyway.
jpnChrName: この場は見逃してあげるよ。
jpnSearchText: この場は見逃してあげるよ。

engChrName: Leave this city before our battle with Heiyue begins.
engSearchText: Leave this city before our battle with Heiyue begins.
jpnChrName: 明日からの黒月との決戦の前に 煌都から去るといい。
jpnSearchText:
明日からの黒月との決戦の前に
煌都から去るといい。

engChrName: That is, unless you all want to end up like them.
engSearchText: That is, unless you all want to end up like them.
jpnChrName: その者たちのような血と肉塊に 変えられたくなければな。
jpnSearchText:
その者たちのような血と肉塊に
変えられたくなければな。

engChrName: I...won't let...you...
engSearchText: I...won't let...you...
jpnChrName: 待ち……やがれ……
jpnSearchText: 待ち……やがれ……

engChrName: Aaron, please stop!
engSearchText: Aaron, please stop!
jpnChrName: 駄目です、アーロンさん！
jpnSearchText: 駄目です、アーロンさん！

engChrName: I'll...get my...
engSearchText: I'll...get my...
jpnChrName: 俺は……アイツらを………
jpnSearchText: 俺は……アイツらを………

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnSearchText: ……ぐふっ………

engChrName: Hear that? The walking corpse still has some spunk left!
engSearchText:
Hear that? The walking corpse still has some
spunk left!
jpnChrName: あはは、いいねぇ！ そういう足掻きは嫌いじゃないよ！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、いいねぇ！
そういう足掻きは嫌いじゃないよ！

engChrName: When next we meet, challenge us with all the anger and resentment you can muster.
engSearchText:
When next we meet, challenge us with all the anger
and resentment you can muster.
jpnChrName: 怨嗟と憎悪は受け止めよう。 その気なら“戦場”で待っている。
jpnSearchText:
怨嗟と憎悪は受け止めよう。
その気なら“戦場”で待っている。

engChrName: GET BACK HEEERE!
engSearchText: GET BACK HEEERE!
jpnChrName: クソがああああああああああッッ！！！
jpnSearchText: クソがああああああああああッッ！！！

engChrName: We don't have time to fetch backup.
engSearchText: We don't have time to fetch backup.
jpnChrName: 応援を呼んでる時間もねえ。 このまま奥へ向かうぞ！
jpnSearchText:
応援を呼んでる時間もねえ。
このまま奥へ向かうぞ！

engChrName: Right, we need to find Aaron!
engSearchText: Right, we need to find Aaron!
jpnChrName: はい、アーロンさんに 追いつきましょう！
jpnSearchText:
はい、アーロンさんに
追いつきましょう！
